fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
__Food Gaining Abilities__
- __Cuddle (Night):__ Cuddle up with another player, increasing their defense by one stage and roleblocking them. While you're staying at their house, you are given __**1** food__.
- __Beg (Night):__ Scratch at someone's door during the night. They will be notified that a Stray Cat is visiting them and can choose to either let them in or keep the door closed. If you are let in, gain __**4** food__.
- __Steal (Night):__ Sneak into another player's house during the night. If you are the only visitor, you'll successfully steal and gain __**8** food__, however, if someone else also visits you target, you will instead be caught and escape with no food pilfered.

__Food Draining Abilities__
- __Groom (Night):__ At the cost of __**5** food__, you may choose to groom yourself throughout the night, granting you Powerful defense as you tend to any wounds you may receive.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value: - __Charm (Day):__ Putting all of your energy into appearing as cute as possible, you'll lose __**10** food__, but gain immunity to being lynched or executed for one cycle.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock immune
- You may not use more than one Food Gaining ability per night.
- If there is another Stray Cat in the game, you will know who they are.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive and accumulate at least 20 food by the end of the game.
